about.description:
Forge is the Materials Data Facility Python package to interface and
leverage the MDF Data Discovery service. Forge allows users to perform
simple queries and facilitiates moving and synthesizing results.
about.summary: Forge is the Python package to access data in the Materials Data Facility

name: mdf_forge
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "mdf_forge" %}
{% set version = "0.7.5" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cbbf9dede4c41ea131949c173e18073f25d49c82d77e7b113a860fa033bfcab2

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.5
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.5
    - mdf_toolbox >=0.4.10
    - globus-sdk >=1.7.0
    - requests >=2.18.4
    - tqdm >=4.19.4

test:
  imports:
    - mdf_forge

about:
  home: https://github.com/materials-data-facility/forge
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Forge is the Python package to access data in the Materials Data Facility'

  description: |
    Forge is the Materials Data Facility Python package to interface and 
    leverage the MDF Data Discovery service. Forge allows users to perform 
    simple queries and facilitiates moving and synthesizing results.
  doc_url: http://mdf-forge.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/materials-data-facility/forge

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
